00029 class ThreadedJobCourier: public JobCourier {

00035       CourierData( JobCourier* courier,
00036                    JobReply* reply,
00037                    bool urgent ):
00038          m_courier( courier ),
00039          m_reply( reply ),
00040          m_urgent( urgent ) {
00041       }

00044          delete m_reply;
00045       }
